name: acms-google-calendar
description: Google Calendar API と連携し、お問い合わせフォームなどで送信された内容を任意のGoogleカレンダーに登録できます。

scripts.package: npm run setup && npm run build:app
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run package && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run package && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run package && npm run release:commit

author: appleple
